EmailTemplate.name: Email Approvals
EmailTemplate.Body:
$launcher is requesting the following changes for '$identityDisplayName'

The access request details are:

#if ( $approvalSet.items ) #foreach ($item in $approvalSet.items) Application: $item.application

#if ( $item.nativeIdentity ) Account : $item.nativeIdentity

#end #if ( $item.instance ) Instance : $item.instance

#end Operation: $item.operation

#if ( $item.displayName ) Attribute: $item.displayName

#elseif ( $item.name ) Attribute: $item.name

#end #if ( $item.displayValue ) Value(s): $item.displayValue

#elseif ( $item.csv ) Value(s): $item.csv

#end #if ( $item.requesterComments ) Requester Comments: $item.requesterComments #end #end #end #set ( $case= $item.getWorkflowCase()) #set ( $caseid= $case.getId())

Click on the link below to approve, or reject.

Approve

Reject

Or click on the link to review. %%SP_EA_IIQ_BASE_URL%%/workitem/workItem.jsf?id=$item.id
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying approvers when they need to approve a request made through LCM. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the work item.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: launcherDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the identity who initiatee the request.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes requested to $identityDisplayName need approval
